rules.message: Space must be inserted after else
Space must be inserted before else
Space must be inserted after if
Space must be inserted after for
Space must be inserted after switch
Space must be inserted after '='
Space must be inserted before '='
Space must be inserted after '&'
Space must be inserted before '&'
Space must be inserted after '|'
Space must be inserted before '|'
Space must be inserted before '{'
Space must not be inserted after '('
Space must not be inserted before ')'
Space must not be inserted before ']'
Space must not be inserted before semicolon
Space must be inserted between ')' and '{'
Space must be inserted after ','
Space must be inserted between '//' and following comment
Space must be inserted before comment
Space must be inserted between ']' and following message
Remove trailing spaces
Use spaces for identation instead of tab
Line length exceeds %d characters
